title: Vengeance is Mine, All Others Pay Cash - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Movie   Disabilities   Male Protagonist
author: Eka Kurniawan
description: Ajo Kawir is one of the toughest fighters in the Javanese underworld, his fearlessness matched only by his unquenchable thirst for brawling. But the young thug is driven by a painful secret: he is impotent. When he finally meets his match in the shape of the fearsome, beautiful bodyguard Iteung, Ajo is left bruised, battered, and overjoyed. He has fallen in love. But will he ever be able to make Iteung happy if he canâ€™t get it up?>
